member.name: M:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a default, empty XamInfoBox object.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the content of the InfoBox.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.ContentTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the data template that is used to display the content of the InfoBox.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.IsOpen
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the InfoBox is open.
member.value: true if the InfoBox is open; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.RelativeToElement
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the element in the visual tree relative to which the InfoBox will be shown.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.RelativeToElementPlacement
member.summary: Gets or sets location of InfoBox relative to .

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.PointerBaseLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of the pointer base.
member.value: The length of the pointer base.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.PointerLength
member.summary: Gets or sets desired length of the pointer.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.PointerOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset between the pointer and the .

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.IsClosedOnOutsideTap
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the InfoBox is closed when the user tap outside.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.IsClosedOnBackButton
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the InfoBox is closed when the back button is pressed.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.PointerBackground
member.summary: Gets or sets the Brush that specifies how to paint the InfoBox pointer.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.PointerBorderBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the Brush that specifies how the InfoBox pointer outline is painted.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.PointerBorderThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the InfoBox pointer outline.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.CornerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the radius for the corners of the InfoBox.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.PointerShape
member.summary: Gets or sets the kind of pointer used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.DisconnectedPointerOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset between the pointer and the InfoBox when a disconnected pointer is used in .

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.UseOpenAnimation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the animation will be shown or not, when the InfoBox is open.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.UseCloseAnimation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the animation will be shown or not, when the InfoBox is closed.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.FloatingMargin
member.summary: Gets or sets margin values (left,top,right,bottom) restricting position of the control on the screen.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.ShowAgain
member.summary: Gets or sets the ShowAgain property value. When true, the window will be displayed the next time it is requested.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.ForceShowAgain
member.summary: Gets or set the ForceShowAgain property value. When true, the window will be displayed the next time it is requested regardless the ShowAgain property value.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.UniqueKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the UniqueKey property value, used to identify a specific ShowAgain user response.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Interactions.XamInfoBox.Storage
member.summary: Gets or sets a class implementing the IXamWindowStorage interface. DefaultXamWindowStorage class is set by default.
